Control Name: Determines Personal Information Used or Disclosed—When an unauthorized use or disclosure of personal information has occurred, the affected information is identified.

control_attributes.Control: Determines Personal Information Used or Disclosed—When an unauthorized use or disclosure of personal information has occurred, the affected information is identified.
control_attributes.SubCategory: CC7.3 The entity evaluates security events to determine whether they could or have resulted in a failure of the entity to meet its objectives (security incidents) and, if so, takes actions to prevent or address such failures.
